activity.author: Superman
activity.description: Superman finished "When creating an alert, I want to define a severity"

activity.author: Spiderman
activity.description: Superman edited "I want to delete alert notifications from the main alert notification page"

story.description:
In the main page, in place of the "Ignore" column, we will have a "Delete" column.
At the bottom, there should be a Deletar button, just like the "Aplicar" button (without the dropdown) in the Solicitacao management page. So, the user will be able to select many notifications and delete multiples at the same time.
